scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.init: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install concurrently --save-dev && powershell -Command "cd backend; $env:NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED='0'; npx prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma; npx prisma migrate dev --name init --schema prisma/schema.prisma" && npm run dev
